properties.areaDesc: Vermilion to Avon Point OH; Willowick to Geneva-on-the Lake OH; Willowick to Geneva-on-the-Lake OH beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Geneva-on-the-Lake to Conneaut OH; Avon Point to Willowick OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Vermilion to Avon Point OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Avon Point to Willowick OH; Geneva-on-the-Lake to Conneaut OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:06AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 knots with gusts up to 55 knots
and waves 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of central Lake Erie.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
